<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>true</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>change_request</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="change_request">active=true^stateVALCHANGES^ORcmdb_ciVALCHANGES^ORstart_dateVALCHANGES^ORend_dateVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="active" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="true"/> <item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="false" field="cmdb_ci" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/> <item endquery="false" field="start_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/> <item endquery="false" field="end_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Cancel Conflict Detection</name> <order>99</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*undefined when async or display*/) { var RUNNING = "1"; var trackerGr = new GlideRecord("sys_execution_tracker"); trackerGr.addQuery("source", current.getUniqueValue()); trackerGr.addQuery("name", ChangeCheckConflicts.TRACKER_NAME); trackerGr.addQuery("state", RUNNING); trackerGr.query();
var MESSAGE = gs.getMessage("The conflict check has been cancelled because the change request it was being run against has been modified"); if (trackerGr.next()) SNC.GlideExecutionTracker.getBySysID(trackerGr.getUniqueValue()).cancel(MESSAGE);
})(current, typeof previous != 'undefined' ? previous : null);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2015-07-22 13:37:49</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>3486431bc3110200fb93e219cdba8f69</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Cancel Conflict Detection</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Change Management - Collision Detector" source="com.snc.change.collision">6349f4643cf1311068bcf327dfe37f55</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_3486431bc3110200fb93e219cdba8f69</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-05-05 15:27:14</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=3486431bc3110200fb93e219cdba8f69"/> </record_update>
